title: Havent played in a while. Came back to a stolen account!!!!
body: I was a lvl 30 with a lot of champs. I stopped playing for a while and when i came back, i couldnt log in. Please help. support is so long . I know that someone has it because of the match history. Look it up: -snip-

replies.body: I've snipped out the summoner name for privacy.  We can help with this, just reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  Our account team can look into this and help restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
